rule_if: if "grazer" and no prey item indicated
rule_then: assign all plants and general algae nodes and assign confidence of 3

rule_if: if "grazer" and brown algae listed as prey
rule_then: assign all nodes in category brown algae and confidence of 3

rule_if: if "filter feeder" and no prey item indicated
rule_then: assign nodes that represent small planktonic organisms and confidence of 4 (because filter feeders have different size selection)
assign all nodes in category "algae", microalgae node, and the coralline algae node

rule_if: if grazing on a colonial organism

rule_then: assign all nodes in category "dead stuff" and assign confidence of 2 (I'm pretty sure)
assign nodes that can reasonably be considered deposits, and assign confidence level 2

rule_if: if category "turbellarian" and no prey item indicated
rule_then: assign nodes that can be reasonably considered "small animals" and are not species specific
notes or reference: Turbellarians are poorly studied but generally referred to as predators of "small animals" and scavengers

rule_if: If habitat is in or on (endo or ecto commensal) a filter feeder (and no clear signs of parasitism)
rule_then: assign trophic strategy "filter feeder" (and follow rule 3), and create a link with type "kleptoparasitism"

rule_if: If category = gammarid and no prey item indicated and no trophic strategy indicated
rule_then: assign trophic strategy "omnivore" and all reasonable links for a small omnivorous crustacean
notes or reference: do via code using species in RIZ Species List: small_omnivore_prey

rule_if: If isopod in family Idoteidae and no prey item indicated
rule_then: assume grazer of mixed algae and detritus

rule_if: If isopod in family Janiridae and no prey item indicated
rule_then: assume detritivore and assign relevant links

rule_if: if free living nematode with no prey item indicated
notes or reference: do via code using species in RIZ Species List: small_predator_prey
